title: Guess Men's W0040G7 Stainless Steel Blue Genuine Leather Multi-Function Watch
description: - Case Material: Stainless Steel (brushed/polished) - Case Colour: Silver - Bezel made of: Stainless Steel (brushed/polished) - Crystal: Mineral crystal - Back: Srewed-in back - Display Type: Hours, Minutes, Seconds & Weekday, Date, 24h Indication - Movement: Quartz - Calendar: Weekday + Date - Complications: 3 (Date, Day,24h) - Dial Colour: Blue - Dial Style: Smooth - Illuminated: fluorescent (green) - Strap Colour: Blue - Clasp: Buckle clasp - Strap Material: Leather (crocodile finish) - Product: Watch - Manufacturer: Guess - Model: Rigor - Special Feature: Solid Case - Logo on: Dial, Back, Clasp - Hallmark: Stainless Steel 316L - Packaging: Original Packaging with Documents - Other Functions: Screwed-in crown - Clasp: Buckle clasp - Distance between lugs in mm/inches: 53 / 134,62 - Width of the Strap in mm/Inches: 450 / 1143,0 - Diameter (without crown) in mm/inches: 45 / 114,3 - Weight in g/ounces: 105 / 3,7 - Height in mm/inches: 13 / 33,02 - Maximal Strap Circumference in mm/inches: 205 / 520,7 - Water-restistant (bar): 10,0
